title: *SCARY* Nocturne Rework
body:
Hi, everything is in the image, I know it's quite some change, I might not be sure about the anti-mage thing but give me your opinion, I'm doing this alone and I have no one to discuss this except you guys :) 

Tell me if you like how I did the concept and if you would like to have more

PS: English is not my main language

https://i.imgur.com/NdxArQ2.jpg

replies.body: Generally confused as to the abilities, but i understand that English isn't your first language
